about_the_game:
In Spellbound Shuffle, embark into a fantasy realm threatened by mystical creatures. Leave behind the tired conventions of traditional deckbuilders and dive headfirst into a tactical roguelike experience where every move, every card, and every choice holds the key to victory.

Features :


🃏 Build your deck 🃏
Begin your adventure as a humble hero armed with a basic deck of cards. As you progress through combats, seize the opportunity to build and customize your deck with powerful, game-changing cards and augments. Choose your path wisely, as the strategic decisions you make will shape your run.


🛡️ Master Tactical Combat 🛡️
Engage in tactical grid-based combat that will push your wits to the limit. Position your hero strategically, deploy your cards with precision, and outsmart your enemies with clever combos. Victory is not just about power; it's about strategy.


🎮 Infinite Replayability 🎮
Every run is a fresh adventure, with procedurally generated levels and a staggering variety of cards to discover. The possibilities are endless, ensuring that no two playthroughs are ever the same. Embrace the challenge and revel in the thrill of infinite replayability.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A roguelike deckbuilding game with turn based tactical combats. Choose your hero, build a powerful deck and collect augments to beat the challenges ahead ! Use clever positioning and tactics and build a strategy around your playstyle.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
